sentences.en: Aircraft production continued to plod along at an agonizingly slow pace.
sentences.cn: 飞机制造业仍旧举步维艰，发展速度之缓很让人头疼。

sentences.en: At other times they plod along in drawn - out lines , creating deep ruts in the dusty soil.
sentences.cn: 那时它们的阵线拉得很长, 沉重的脚步在尘土里踏出深深的印迹.

sentences.en: But it meant that we could plod away unnoticed, plotting more outrageous things.
sentences.cn: 不过那正意味着我们可以不引人注意地变换, 增加更多疯狂荒谬的东西.

sentences.en: Crowds of people plodded around in yellow plastic raincoats.
sentences.cn: 一群群身穿黄色塑料雨衣的人在四下里吃力地走着。

sentences.en: He was destined to plod the path of toil.
sentences.cn: 他注定要在艰辛的道路上跋涉.

sentences.en: I could recognize his plod anywhere.
sentences.cn: 我能在任何地方辨认出他的沉重脚步声.

sentences.en: No, there aren’t, so in all likelihood I will have to plod across those green meadows with a herd of American tourists, disgruntled that everything is so ancient and small.
sentences.cn: 不，没有这种人，因此我十之八九会和这群美国游客沉重而缓慢地走过那片绿色的草地，对一切都这么古老和渺小而感到不悦。

sentences.en: The secret of good work to plod away and still keep the passion flesh.
sentences.cn: 做好工作的秘诀在于坚持不懈地干下去并保持热情不减.

sentences.en: Then we had to plod through my providing a credit card number, e - mail address and directions.
sentences.cn: 然后我们不得不费劲地弄完手续,提供我的信用卡卡号 、 电子邮箱 地址,我还给他指了到我家的路该怎么走.

sentences.en: They had to plod wearily on up the hill.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不迈着疲倦的步子登上山.

words.tran_cn: 单调乏味的；沉重缓慢的
沉重行走的人；辛勤工作的人
沉重地走；辛勤工作（plod的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: to walk along slowly, especially when this is difficult

trans.tran_cn: 沉重缓慢地行走，孜孜不倦，勤苦地工作
